Text:
Thanks for seeding these, Living420!

   "The Boondocks" is brilliant, absolutely brilliant.  It's refreshing to see intelligent TV like this.  And episode 5 in particular, wow--- what an allegory!  It didn't even hit me until about halfway through what it was all about.  Awesome.
...and yet it was so obvious.  That guy with a big "W" hanging around his neck.  Heh heh...

The funniest part is when Tom drops the soap. LOL!

Hehe, anybody who has been in prison would know. NEVER drop the soap! XD

If you're looking for crisp, clean, quality versions of seasons 1 and 2 of the Boondocks, then download this other torrent.
